TEXT.TITLE: OMAHA HOGS UP 1.00 DLR - USDA
TEXT.BODY: barrow and gilt prices rose mostly 1.00 dlr in active trade, the usda said. top 51.75 dlrs per cwt. us 1-3 220-260 lbs 51.00-51.50, near 100 head 230-240 lbs 51.75. sows - steady/up 0.50 dlr. us 1-3 500-650 lbs 45.50-46.00. Reuter
